question: Today vaginal sponge failure rate is?
Highest failure rate is seen in:
exp: Ans: b (Condom) Ref: Shaw, 13th ed, p. 217Measurement of contraceptive efficacyPearl index: -Pregnancy rate per 100 women yearsPearl index =Total accidental pregnancy x 1200Total months of exposure to unintended pregnancyLife table techniquePregnancy rate is expressed as 100 women per year.Failure rates CondomNatural FP methodSpermicidesWithdrawalOther vaginal barriers1221211821 IUCD - Medicated1Inert3Progesterone only pill3Combined OCP1 -8 (0.1 if correctly used)Injectable contraceptive0.1 -0.4Female sterilization0.4Vasectomy0.2Implant0.4

question: Barrier type of contraception among the following:
exp: Ref: Dutta textbook of obstetrics 5th ed pg.534Explanation:BARRIER METHODS OF CONTRACEPTIONMale-condomsFemale-condom, diaphragm, cervical capSpermicidal creams, jelly and foam tablets Mechanism of action:Prevents sperm deposition in vagina,Prevents sperm penetration through the cervical os,Spermicides cause sperm immobilization.
